__SqlaTable__.sql:
SELECT predengagement, userid as engagement
from customerai.customer_attributes ORDER BY predengagement ASC
select loaddate , highriskcnt   from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata
select  addrcountry, userid as location from pcv.customer_attributes where ispeakrowdelete is null
select loaddate , activecnt from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata
select repeatordercnt , loaddate from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata

SELECT prednexttranswindow, userid as transaction
from pcv.customer_attributes where ispeakrowdelete is null ORDER BY prednexttranswindow ASC
select  addrcountry, userid as location from customerai.customer_attributes
select avgordergapcnt  , loaddate from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata
select predinmarket, userid  from customerai.customer_attributes
select avgbasketsize   , loaddate from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata
select predinmarket, userid  from pcv.customer_attributes where ispeakrowdelete is null
select avgordervalue    , loaddate from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata
select loaddate , avgeltv from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata
select userid as gender, usergender from pcv.customer_attributes where ispeakrowdelete is null
select userid as gender, usergender from customerai.customer_attributes
select loaddate, totalcustomercnt  from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata

SELECT predengagement, userid as engagement
from pcv.customer_attributes where ispeakrowdelete is null ORDER BY predengagement ASC
select singleordercnt, loaddate from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata
select loaddate , inmarkethighcnt  from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata
select loaddate , lapsedcnt  from customerai.aggregatedcustomerdata

SELECT prednexttranswindow, userid as transaction
from customerai.customer_attributes ORDER BY prednexttranswindow ASC

select associationvalue,
         count(*) as user_count,
         associationrank
  from customerai.customer_preferences
  where associationtype = 'Product Recommendation'
  group by associationvalue,
           associationrank
  ORDER by associationrank asc
  limit 10

select   associationvalue , count(*) as user_count , associationrank from customerai.customer_preferences   where associationtype  = 'Brand' and ispeakrowdelete is  null group by associationvalue, associationrank
ORDER by associationrank asc limit 10

select associationvalue,
         count(*) as user_count,
         associationrank
  from pcv.customer_preferences
  where associationtype = 'Product Recommendation' and ispeakrowdelete is null
  group by associationvalue,
           associationrank
  ORDER by associationrank asc
  limit 10
select predchurnrisk , userid as atrisk from customerai.customer_attributes where ispeakrowdelete is null
